vulnerability_findings.name: pragma
vulnerability_findings.message:
Different versions of Solidity is used in PerpTokenMock.sol:
	- Version used: ['0.6.9', 'ABIEncoderV2']
	- PerpTokenMock.sol#4-5 declares pragma solidity0.6.9
	- PerpTokenMock.sol#5-7 declares pragma experimentalABIEncoderV2

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in PerpTokenMock.sol:
	- pragma solidity0.6.9 (PerpTokenMock.sol#4-5): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_totalSupply' of PerpTokenMock.setTotalSupply (PerpTokenMock.sol#10) is not in mixedCase

errors: exception (RuntimeError: Source map error, unknown name(SHR) or instr_name(INVALID))
